title: Bloom Studs - Floral Diamond Vali
features: Delicate floral design featuring meticulously pave-set diamonds. The openwork petals create a modern, airy feel, while the centralized clustered diamonds provide a captivating sparkle. Secured with butterfly clasps for comfortable wear.
colors: White Gold and Brilliant White Diamonds.
occasions: or adding a touch of elegance to any special occasion. Ideal for gifting during birthdays
or as a thoughtful 'push present'. Suits both modern and traditional styles.
description: These exquisite studs blend contemporary floral design with timeless diamond brilliance. Lightweight and comfortable, they are perfect for daily wear and offer effortless sophistication. The high-quality diamonds ensure lasting sparkle and value. A versatile piece that complements any outfit.
